title: League of legends
body: ANY1 know wats wrong with my league of legends. i attempted to play and the LOL icon came up but then it disappeared. I tried multiple times and it still didnt work. any1 know whats wrong?????{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body:
Check out these articles as they probably help more than I would but if they're not enough then you can send a ticket to speak directly with Riot which doesn't take long.

[Bug Splat and Game Crashes Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974)
[Login Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944)
[Technical Issues Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=34190)

If you're still confused then tell me what you're having trouble with and I'll help as much as I can. Otherwise, good luck. :)

1. Try running LoL as Administrator.
2. End all LoL processes in your task manager and try again.
3. Restart your computer and try opening League.
4. Restart your router/modem by turning it off for 30 seconds then turning it back on and try again.
5. Uninstall and re-install.

If none of that works then try contacting Riot directly at https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us
how do u  end all lol processes in task manager?

> [{quoted}](name=Death star giant,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=undWnRwE,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-02-11T02:24:08.255+0000)
>
> how do u  end all lol processes in task manager?

Task manager will have an applications tab, a processes tab, a performance tap and a networking tab.

Click on the processed tab, find anything that is LOL related click on it and then click on End Process.
there were none.... i went to the URL u added but idk wat it would be under and i am abit confused on the process
Try killing the process in you task manager then re-opening league. If that fails maybe try restarting your computer.
how? im in task manager but i cant see lol
